name: QrPngCanvasGrainOptions
summary: Grain/noise texture options for the canvas background.

properties.name: Seed
properties.summary: Random seed used to place grain. Use 0 to auto-randomize per render.

properties.name: BandPx
properties.summary: Optional edge band width in pixels. When greater than 0, grain is limited to the canvas edges.

properties.name: ProtectQrArea
properties.summary: When true, never draws inside the QR area.

properties.name: QrAreaAlphaMax
properties.summary: Maximum alpha allowed inside the QR area when CodeGlyphX.Rendering.Png.QrPngCanvasGrainOptions.ProtectQrArea is false. Set to 0 to apply no alpha limit.
